resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81462</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81462</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4385</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Light: Some Background Information for Teachers</string>
            <string language="es">Luz: Información de respaldo para profesores</string>
            <string language="ga">Solas: Roinnt Eolais Chúlra do Mhúinteoirí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht: Etwas Hintergrundinformationen für 
Lehrer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lumière : De l'information de fond pour 
des professeurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz: Alguma informação de fundo para 
professores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce: Lle certe informazioni di base per 
gli insegnanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως: Κάποιες βασικές πληροφορίες για τους 
δασκάλους</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Some support material for teachers who are planning activities to test and develop children's ideas about light. It contains information about light sources, the path of light, shadows, reflection. refraction, colours and vision.</string>
            <string language="es">Material de soporte para los profesores que estén planeando actividades para comprobar y desarrollar las ideas de los niños sobre la luz. Contiene información sobre fuentes de luz, trayectoria de la luz, sombras, reflexión, refracción, colores y visión.</string>
            <string language="ga">Roinnt ábhair thacaíochta do mhúinteoirí a bhfuil gníomhíochtaí á bpleanáil acu chun smaointe na leanaí faoi sholas a thástáil agus a fhorbairt. Tá eolas ann maidir le foinsí solais, cosán an tsolais, frithchaitheamh, athraonadh, dathanna agus fís.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias SESE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">EnergyForces</string>
            <string language="es">Fuerzas de energía</string>
            <string language="ga">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Etwas Hilfsmaterial für Lehrer, die die Planung 
Aktivitäten sind, zum der Ideen der Kinder über Licht zu prüfen und
zu entwickeln. Es enthält Informationen über Lichtquellen, den
Pfad des Lichtes, die Schatten, Reflexion Brechung, Farben und 
Anblick.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un certain matériel de support pour les 
professeurs qui sont des activités de planification pour tester et 
développer les idées des enfants au sujet de la lumière. Elle
contient les informations sur des sources lumineuses, la voie d'accès
de la lumière, des ombres, la réfraction de réflexion, des couleurs
et la vision.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Algum material de sustentação para os 
professores que são atividades do planeamento para testar e 
desenvolver idéias das crianças sobre a luz. Contem a 
informação sobre fontes claras, o trajeto da luz, sombras, 
refraction da reflexão, cores e visão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un certo materiale di sostegno per gli insegnanti
che sono attività di progettazione per verificare e sviluppare le 
idee dei bambini circa luce. Contiene le informazioni sulle 
fonti di luce, il percorso di luce, le ombre, la rifrazione di 
riflessione, i colori e la visione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μερικοί υποστηρίζουν το υλικό για τους δασκάλους που 
προγραμματίζουν τις δραστηριότητες για να εξετάσουν και να 
αναπτύξουν τις ιδέες των παιδιών για το φως. Περιέχει τις 
πληροφορίες για τις πηγές φωτός, το μονοπάτι του φωτός, τις 
σκιές, τη διάθλαση αντανάκλασης, τα χρώματα και το όραμα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
